products.name: Lazar
products.shortDescription: Dual cannons, radar-guided missiles, durable armor..
products.longDescription: A classic military jet based on the F-16 Fighting Falcon, known for its agility and firepower with a Top Speed: 185 knots with Dual cannons, radar-guided missiles, durable armor.

products.name: Raiju
products.shortDescription: The fastest and most advanced jet .
products.longDescription: The fastest and most advanced jet , ideal for high-stakes aerial combat with features: VTOL capability, stealth mode, explosive cannons, homing missiles with Top Speed: 374 km/h (232 mph).

products.name: Hercules
products.longDescription: A formidable aircraft designed for delivering massive firepower from the skies Based on the AC-130 gunship, equipped with heavy weaponry..

products.name: Moltok
products.shortDescription: A vintage jet fighter with impressive speed and firepower..
products.longDescription: A vintage jet fighter with impressive speed and firepower Based on the MiG-15, equipped with machine guns and optional homing missiles with Top Speed: 207.75 mph.

products.name: X Wing
products.longDescription: Weapons:4x Taim & Bak KX9 laser cannons (wing-mounted) 2x Krupx MG7 proton torpedo launchers (with 6 torpedoes) Engines: 4x Incom 4L4 fusial thrust engines Speed: Sublight: ~1,050 km/h (atmospheric) Hyperdrive: Class 1.0 (faster than Imperial TIE Fighters, which lack hyperdrives)Shields: Equipped with deflector shield generators (defensive advantage over TIEs) Astromech Socket: R2 unit (for navigation, repairs, and targeting support)
